source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video shows a white tiled room with a spiral staircase leading down into a pool of water. The camera then pans to another area of the room, revealing more white tiles and some dark grey sections on the wall. There is no subject motion in this brief clip.

source_caption_data.final_caption: The video shows a white tiled room with a spiral staircase leading down into a pool of water. The camera then pans to another area of the room, revealing more white tiles and some dark grey sections on the wall. There is no subject motion in this brief clip.

bad_caption: A person enters a brightly lit kitchen, walks over to a countertop, and begins slicing vegetables. After finishing, they place the chopped vegetables into a large glass bowl and stir them with a wooden spoon. No other people or animals are present in the scene.
